reference_summary:
Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber P.travel {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} [[VIDEOID:e63684315904fe3d7cd3092a12671e7d]] This is a great kit for my household. We do touch ups in between our appointments. The cape is thin and has small ties in the back but works perfect for both my husband and I. The scissors are a little bigger so for my smaller hands I could use a little bit smaller pair but it does the trick. I also have used the cape when I dye my roots and it works great to keep me protected. Perfect kit for my touch ups Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare Manilla Natural Skincare {'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I am a lover of high quality face serums because they soak into your skin without leaving you greasy like oils or lotions but unfortunately not all serums Are created equal. Some are packed with cheap oils and don’t truly work, well Not this one!!! This one is everything! I put it on all over my face, neck and especially under my eyes (which is my trouble spot because of little wrinkles) and this soaks in so beautiful. It hydrated that area so my makeup goes on like butter! It is a very light fresh smell- I almost don’t smell anything- which is perfect because my eyes can water so easy but not with this serum!
It’s vegan friendly too!
Manila serum is a must have in my morning routine. Obsessed with this serum Hylunia Hydrate Body Wash - Energizing Blend With Mango 8.5 oz Hylunia {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '059ENM-250-R', 'UPC': '185449000313'} This lathers up so nice and is beyond moisturizing to my skin. My skin felt fresh and so hydrated! The mango body wash smells so good that my husband even commented how yummy I smell. Obsessed with this mango body wash
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** The user remains dedicated to personal grooming with a preference for hair cutting and styling tools for home use, showcasing a DIY approach to hair care.

- **Skincare Interest:** They have expanded their skincare interests to include facial products and body care as well, particularly enjoying moisturizing options that enhance the overall sensory experience.

- **Product Preference:** The user values comprehensive kits and effective solutions across their personal care regimen, seeking products that deliver noticeable results rather than superficial benefits.

- **Practicality:** They maintain a practical mindset, appreciating functional solutions for both hair and skincare needs, showing a preference for items that offer versatility and effectiveness.

- **Ease of Use:** The importance of user-friendly products is evident; they prioritize ergonomic designs in tools and skincare, opting for products that absorb well and complement their personal care routines.

- **Multi-Use Capability:** The user continues to favor items that serve multiple purposes, as seen in their application of hydrating products across various areas of their body.

- **Overall Experience:** High satisfaction with previous purchases reflects positive interactions with brands known for quality, functionality, and conscientious personal care products, including vegan-friendly options. 

The addition of a favorite body wash indicates their appreciation for rich, hydrating formulations that enhance personal care experiences, further solidifying their detail-oriented approach to skincare.
